text: Bahlul Mustafazade (; born on 27 February 1997 in Baku, Azerbaijan) is an Azerbaijani football defender who plays for Sabah in the Azerbaijan Premier League and the Azerbaijan national football team. ==Career== ===Club=== On 7 February 2017, Mustafazade joined Sumgayit FK on loan from Gabala FK. On 26 June 2019, Mustafazade signed a three-year contract with Sabah FK. ===International=== Mustafazade made his debut for Azerbaijan on 6 September 2019 in their UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying match
